name: Dark Sprotin.fo
css:
@-moz-document domain("sprotin.fo") {
.header--section-lower,
.frontpage-search--component .frontpage-search--self,
#main--component,
#page_frontpage .layout--component .layout--center-pane,
.newsgroup--component,
.newsgroup--text,
.newsgroup--image-holder,
.products--component,
.layout--component.layout--component--dictionary-controls,
.product--component,
.newsgroup--link,
.newsarticle--component,
.layout--component--gray,
.courses--course.ease-edit,
.user-login--component,
.forgotten-password--component,
.user-create--component,
.pagemenu--component,
.user-profile--component,
.user-profile-update--component,
.user-profile-password--component,
.user-profile-bookclub--component,
.user-downloads--component,
.user-purchases--component,
.user-purchases-invoice--component,
.dictionary-results--component .dictionary-results--search-results--cards .dictionary-results--word,
.checkout--component {
	background-color: #1d1d1d !important;
}

.header--section-lower a,
.frontpage-search--text,
.frontpage-search--recent-words-label,
#frontpage_searchbox,
.frontpage-search--component .frontpage-search--searchbox::placeholder,
.contentgroup--item.contentgroup--item--html.ease-edit h2[style],
.newsgroup--title,
.newsgroup--subtitle,
#textboxSearchForProduct,
#textboxSearchForProduct::placeholder,
.selectator_options .selectator_option,
.dictionary-controls--button-text,
.products--text-holder div,
.dictionary-input--textbox,
.dictionary-input--textbox::placeholder,
.dictionary-input--component .dictionary-input--virtual-keyboard-icon,
.dictionary-selector--total-results,
.dictionary-results--info,
.dictionary-results--dictionary-summary,
.dictionary-results--pager-summary,
.dictionary-results--word-subtitle span,
.dictionary-results--word-description span,
.dictionary-results--word-description,
.dictionary-results--not-found-title,
.dictionary-inflectedform--editor,
.dictionary-inflectedform--title,
.dictionary-inflectedform--component.dictionary-inflectedform--component--tablet,
.dictionary-share--title,
.dictionary-feedback--component,
.dictionary-feedback--comment,
.dictionary-feedback--comment::placeholder,
.dictionary-feedback--email,
.dictionary-feedback--email::placeholder,
.dictionary-feedback--name,
.dictionary-feedback--name::placeholder,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--component,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--suggestion,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--suggestion::placeholder,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--email,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--email::placeholder,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--name,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--name::placeholder,
.dictionary-spellchecker--self,
.product--filter-section-title,
.product--component .product--type--active,
.product--component .product--title,
.product--content,
.product--filtergroups,
.product--details,
.product--price,
.product--membership-price,
.product--not-member,
.product--available-as,
.product--currencies,
.product--component .product--currency--active,
.product--delivery-info,
.product--about-author,
.product--quantity-title,
.dictionaries-autocomplete--text,
.search--component .search--input,
.search--component .search--input::placeholder,
.newsgroup-column--date,
.layout--center-pane h4,
.newsarticle--title,
.newsarticle--info-text,
.newsarticle--component .newsarticle--self .newsarticle--content,
.richtext--content,
.richtext--content ul li::before,
.richtext--content ul li span,
.products--next-bookclub-title,
.layout--center-pane h3,
#ease_flexibleitem_22 p > span[style],
#ease_flexibleitem_22 p span[style],
.courses--course.ease-edit,
#ease_flexibleitem_30,
.employees--text-holder,
.user-login--main-title,
label,
.site--main .checkator_element.checkbox::after,
#textboxEmail,
#textboxEmail::placeholder,
#textboxPassword,
#textboxPassword::placeholder,
.forgotten-password--main-title,
.forgotten-password--main-subtitle,
b,
small,
.user-create--component,
#textboxPasswordRepeat,
#textboxPasswordRepeat::placeholder,
#textboxName,
#textboxName::placeholder,
#textboxAddress,
#textboxAddress::placeholder,
#textboxZipCode,
#textboxZipCode::placeholder,
#textboxCity,
#textboxCity::placeholder,
.pagemenu--self,
.pagemenu--self ul li a,
.user-profile--component,
#textboxCurrentPassword,
#textboxCurrentPassword::placeholder,
.site--main .checkator_source + .checkator_element.radio::after,
#ease_flexibleitem_6,
.user-downloads--item,
.user-purchases--component,
.user-purchases-invoice--component,
.small,
.newsarticle--component .newsarticle--self .newsarticle--subtitle,
.product--subtitle,
.product--component .product--quantity-select,
.checkout-cart--component .checkout-cart--items .checkout-cart--filters,
.checkout-cart--total-price,
.checkout-cart--summation,
.checkout-cart--input.checkout-cart--input--quantity,
.checkout-cart--input.checkout-cart--input--quantity::placeholder,
.checkout-progress--component .checkout-progress--tab--active .checkout-progress--link,
.checkout-progress--component .checkout-progress--tab .checkout-progress--link,
.checkout-info--other-delivery-address,
#textboxBillingName,
#textboxBillingName::placeholder,
#textboxBillingAddress,
#textboxBillingAddress::placeholder,
#textboxBillingZipCode,
#textboxBillingZipCode::placeholder,
#textboxBillingCity,
#textboxBillingCity::placeholder,
#textboxBillingPhone,
#textboxBillingPhone::placeholder,
#textboxBillingEmail,
#textboxBillingEmail::placeholder,
.checkout-delivery--component .checkout-delivery--list-subtitle,
.checkout--component.checkout-cart--component {
	color: white !important;
}

.pagemenu--component .pagemenu--main-title {
	border-top: 5px solid white !important;
}

.product--component .product--type--active {
	border-bottom: 1px solid white !important;
}

mark,
#ease_flexibleitem_20 .richtext--content h2 {
	color: black !important;
}

.dictionary-results--word-title {
	color: #6666ff !important;
}

#frontpage_searchbox,
.frontpage-search--component .frontpage-search--recent-word,
.products--link,
#textboxSearchForProduct,
.selectator--component .selectator_element .selectator_options,
.dictionary-input--textbox,
.dictionary-feedback--comment,
.dictionary-feedback--email,
.dictionary-feedback--name,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--suggestion,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--email,
.dictionary-send-suggestion--name,
.dictionaries-autocomplete--component,
.dictionary-spellchecker--component .dictionary-spellchecker--editor,
.search--component .search--input,
#textboxEmail,
#textboxPassword,
#textboxPasswordRepeat,
#textboxName,
#textboxAddress,
#textboxZipCode,
#textboxCity,
#textboxCurrentPassword,
.user-purchases--component .user-purchases--table-row:nth-child(2n+1),
.product--component .product--quantity-select,
.checkout-cart--input.checkout-cart--input--quantity,
.checkout-progress--component .checkout-progress--tab .checkout-progress--link,
#textboxBillingName,
#textboxBillingAddress,
#textboxBillingZipCode,
#textboxBillingCity,
#textboxBillingPhone,
#textboxBillingEmail,
.invoice--component .invoice--accept-terms {
	background-color: black !important;
}

.frontpage-search--component .frontpage-search--recent-word:hover,
.active,
.dictionaries-autocomplete--component .dictionaries-autocomplete--item--active,
.checkout-progress--component .checkout-progress--tab--active .checkout-progress--link {
	background-color: #222 !important;
}

ul li a:hover {
	text-decoration: underline !important;
}

.newsgroup--image,
.button.warning:disabled,
.newsarticle--main-image,
.course_image.expand {
	opacity: 0.6 !important;
	transition: all .2s;
}

.newsgroup--image:hover,
.newsarticle--main-image:hover,
.course_image.expand:hover {
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

.newsgroup--component .newsgroup--newsarticle .newsgroup--link .newsgroup--newsarticle-newsgroup,
.dictionary-results--not-found-suggestions,
.dictionary-results--not-found-content,
#ease_flexibleitem_22 p span[style] strong span[style],
#ease_flexibleitem_22 p span strong,
#ease_flexibleitem_22 p strong span[style] {
	color: #e06666 !important;
}

.newsgroup--component .newsgroup--newsarticle .newsgroup--link .newsgroup--newsarticle-newsgroup::after {
	border-bottom: 1px solid #e06666 !important;
}

results--search-results--list .dictionary-results--word-icon--active,
.dictionary-results--component .dictionary-results--search-results--list .dictionary-results--word-icon--active,
.dictionary-controls--component .dictionary-controls--button--active .dictionary-controls--button-text {
	color: #e26681 !important;
}

.dictionary-controls--component .dictionary-controls--button--active .dictionary-controls--button-icon {
	background-color: #e26681 !important;
}

.search--icon,
.dictionary-input--search-icon,
.dictionary-input--reset-icon,
.richtext--image-wrapper,
.dictionary-results--component .dictionary-results--search-results--cards .dictionary-results--word-image-owner {
	filter: invert(100%);
}

#selectBillingCustomerType,
#selectBillingCountryId,
#selectCountryId {
	border-color: black;
	color: black;
	filter: invert(100%);
}

/*
.product--component .product--quantity-select,
.richtext--image-wrapper--center-20,
.select{
	filter: invert(0);
}
*/
}
